GenAiPlugin.description: Assist customers in updating their contact details.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the customer wants to update their email address, phone number, or postal address, use SvcCopilotTmpl__UpdateCustomerContact.
Ensure the customer provides the new contact details before proceeding with the update.
